mapper.insert: insert into mp02_user ( LOGINNAME, REALNAME , PASSWORD , WORKORGANKEY , ORGANKEY , FLAG , ISBUILDIN, ISADMIN , ISHEAD , ADDRESS, POSTALCODE, EMAILADDRESS , TELEPHONE , MOBILEPHONE , USERDES , SEX , BIRTH , EDUCATION , POSITION , POSTITLE , WORKLEVEL , POLITICAL , INDATE , STAFCODE , REMARK , LASTUSER , LASTTS ) values ( #{loginname}, #{realname,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{workorgankey,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{organkey,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,javaType=String,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isbuildin,javaType=String,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{isadmin,javaType=String,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{ishead,javaType=String,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{address,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postalcode,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emailaddress,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilephone,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userdes,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,javaType=String,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{birth,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postitle,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{worklevel,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{political,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indate,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stafcode,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastuser,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastts,javaType=String,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
